meta.title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
meta.subject: Computer Science
meta.description: This capsule introduces key concepts of cybersecurity including threats, encryption, and safe online practices.

notes: Cybersecurity protects systems and networks from digital attacks.
Common threats include malware, phishing, and ransomware.
Always keep software updated to reduce vulnerabilities.

flashcards.front: What is the main goal of cybersecurity?
flashcards.back: To protect systems, networks, and data from unauthorized access and attacks.
A type of cyber attack where attackers trick users into revealing sensitive information via fake emails or websites.

quiz.q: Which of the following is an example of malware?
quiz.explain: A Trojan Horse is a type of malware disguised as legitimate software.

quiz.q: Which practice helps improve password security?
quiz.explain: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of protection beyond just passwords.
